mapper.select: /* UserDAO.userDetail */ select a.user_no , a.user_type , a.user_id , a.user_email , a.approved_yn , a.use_yn , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as reg_date , b.user_name , b.user_gender , b.user_birthday , calc_age(str_to_date(b.user_birthday,'%Y-%m-%d')) as user_age , date_format(b.approved_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as approved_date , b.approved_user_no , b.photo_file_no , get_file_path(b.photo_file_no) as photo_file_path , b.tel1_no , b.tel2_no , b.user_url , date_format(b.last_login_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as last_login_date , b.last_login_ip , b.agree01 , b.agree02 from tb_user a , tb_user_info b where a.user_no = b.user_no and a.user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.update: /* UserDAO.updateUserInfo */ update tb_user_info set photo_file_no = #{photo_file_no} where user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: /* UserDAO.userInfo */ select a.user_no , b.user_name , a.user_email , case when b.user_gender = 'M' then '남' else '여' end as user_gender_name , b.tel1_no , get_file_path(b.photo_file_no) as photo_file_path , get_code_name('001', a.user_type) as user_type_name , calc_age(b.user_birthday) as user_age , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date , a.use_yn from tb_user a , tb_user_info b where a.user_no = #{user_no} and a.user_type= #{user_type} and a.approved_yn = 'Y' and a.user_no = b.user_no
